name: Maël Le Goff
description: I am a Software Engineer with a master’s degree of science from @UTBM.
I was born in France and have spent the last two years living in Seoul, South Korea on an E-7 visa. I am fluent in English and have an intermediate proficiency in Korean business language.

For the past two years, I have worked as a Full Stack developer at @XenoImpact, where I have gained valuable experience in developing and operating both mobile and web applications using Java, Javascript, and Flutter technologies.
Now, I am excited to take on a new challenge and explore new opportunities.

If you are interested in learning more about my experience and skills, please take a look at my resume or feel free to reach out to me directly. I am confident that my expertise and passion for technology would make me a valuable asset to your team.
credits: Many thanks to @Epidural who designed the 3D model.
